Text: Transfer is a technique used in propaganda and advertising.

1:

Text: Transfer (propaganda):  Also known as association, this is a technique of projecting positive or negative qualities (praise or blame) of a person, entity, object, or value (an individual, group, organization, nation, patriotism, etc.) to another in order to make the second more acceptable or to discredit it.

Triplets:<Transfer

Text: Transfer (propaganda):  Another technique used is celebrity endorsement.
